thread.title: Jennifer Lawrence speaks out on Hollywood's pay gap - ClickOnDetroit
thread.title_full: Jennifer Lawrence speaks out on Hollywood's pay gap - ClickOnDetroit - Discussion on Topix

author: Source: ClickOnDetroit
title: Jennifer Lawrence speaks out on Hollywood's pay gap - ClickOnDetroit
text:
The Oscar-winning star, 25, sounded off about being paid less than her male co-stars on "American Hustle" and said that it's time for her to stop being "adorable" when it comes to negotiating. "I don't think I've ever worked for a man in charge who spent time contemplating what angle he should use to have his voice heard," she wrote in an essay for Lenny , the newsletter founded by Lena Dunham and producer-writer Jenni Konner.
 ClickOnDetroit.
